data.title: Scarface: The World Is Yours
data.meta_description: Scarface: The World Is Yours Sony PlayStation 2 game, comes complete in original case. Cleaned, tested and includes a FREE case protector!
data.text:
Description

Scarface: The World Is Yours Sony PlayStation 2 game, comes complete in original case. Cleaned, tested and includes a FREE case protector!

They thought you were dead, but Tony Montana don't die so easy. Sosa took everything you had. Now you've got nothing, but that never stopped you before. You're back with a vengeance, ready to reclaim your turf and rebuild your empire. All you've got are your balls---and your word.

Live the turbulent life of the infamous Cuban drug lord who redefined the American Dream, in an original explosive script by famed screenwriter David McKeena (Blow, American History X). Climb your way back to the top through savvy deals and brutal intimidation. First you get the money, then you get the power, then you get revenge!

KEY FEATURES

Beat down, blow away or run over your enemies with Tony's signature style and flair.

Bury those cock-a-roaches in Blind Rage Mode.

Insult, intimidate and impress the way only Tony can.

Become the kingpin of a thriving underworld economy.

Experience the lavish lifestyle of a crime boss.

Hire henchmen to do your dirty work.

Explore the open world of Miami and the Islands---go in and out of buildings without loading.

INCLUDES: Case protector, original game case, promo inserts (2), manual and game disc CONDITION: Used - Complete in case GENRE: Action, Adventure, Racing PLATFORM: PlayStation 2, PS2 REGION: NTSC (North America) RELEASE: 2006 RATING: Mature (Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Use of Drugs) PLAYERS: Single-player UPC: 020626722810 SKU: PS2_SLUS21111_CIB

Cheats

Pause the game, choose "CHEATS" and enter any of the following codes.

FLYSTRT Decrease Cop Heat. NOBALLS Decrease Gang Heat. FPATCH Fill Balls Meter. DONUT Increase Cop Heat. AMMO Max Ammo. MEDIK Refill Health. BLACK Black Suit Tony. BLUESH Blue Suit Tony With Sunglasses. GRAY Gray Suit Tony. GRAYSH Gray Suit Tony With Sunglasses. DUMPER Dump Truck. HAWAII Hawaii print/shirt. HAWAIIG Hawaii print/shirt with sunglasses. TUNEME Music Track: "The World Is Yours". TBURGLR Repairs any vehicle player is currently driving. BUMMER Spawn 4x4 Bodog Stampede. SANDY Tan colored outfit. SANDYSH Tan colored outfit with sunglasses. OLDFAST Spawn Ariel MK III. 666999 Spawn Bacinari. DOZER Spawn Bulldozer. MARTHA Change Time of Day. SHAZAAM Toggle Lightning. RAINY Toggle Rain. WHITE White suit Tony. WHITESH White suit Tony with shades.
